sentences.english: Besides, garlic, ginger and fermented soybean are also used in the cooking process.
sentences.chinese: 此外，大蒜，姜和豆豉也被應用於烹飪過程中。

sentences.english: The method has been applied to the determination of isoflavone aglycones in lobster sauce and soy products with satisfactory result.
sentences.chinese: 方法可用於豆豉及其它大豆製品中異黃酮甙元的測定。

sentences.english: The process technology of bacteria-fermented Douchi was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對細菌型豆豉的生產工藝作了深入研究。

sentences.english: Its aroma is at once reminiscent of ripe pineapple and savory fermented fish.
sentences.chinese: 有成熟菠蘿的芳香，也殘留着豆豉魚的風味。

sentences.english: Bean soup served alongside a squash blossom salad.
sentences.chinese: 該店還提供豆豉湯配節瓜花色拉。

sentences.english: Many of the meatless products, such as tofu or tempeh, are made from soybeans.
sentences.chinese: 很多非肉類製品由大豆加工而成，如豆腐和豆豉。

sentences.english: Heat up some oil in the wok to fry the fermented black bean and minced garlic, leave to cool…
sentences.chinese: 豆豉先用少許油炒香，後加入蒜茸爆香後，取出待用。

definition: same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
soy sauce (chiefly in Cantonese and Hakka areas)
